channel.title: Comments on: GrandCentral, The One Number Approach

item.title: By: Kranky is in a bad mood
item.dc:creator: Kranky is in a bad mood
item.description:
<strong>Grandcentral and stupid phone tricks...</strong>
I’ve been experimenting with a service from GrandCentral.com. The company was started by a bunch of ex-Dialpad folks and they’ve created the 2006 version of “find me, follow me” phone service. Unlike other bloggers who quickly post stuff, I’v...
item.content:encoded:
Grandcentral and stupid phone tricks…

I’ve been experimenting with a service from GrandCentral.com. The company was started by a bunch of ex-Dialpad folks and they’ve created the 2006 version of “find me, follow me” phone service. Unlike other bloggers who quickly post stuff, I’v…
